long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DepopAid - Your Ultimate Depop Seller Assistant
DepopAid is a powerful Chrome extension designed for Depop sellers who want to take their store to the next level. By automating repetitive tasks, increasing store visibility, and providing various useful features, DepopAid helps you streamline your selling process, save time, and maximize profits.
Key Features:
· Automatic Product Refresh
- Manually refresh or set up automatic refreshes for listed products to increase exposure
- Customize refresh intervals for flexibility
· Bulk Actions
- Bulk unfollow users and unlike products
- Bulk send direct messages and follow likers of a product
- Bulk follow other sellers' followers, following users, and reviewers
- Bulk like other sellers' products
· Product Management
- Relist deleted products
- Clone other sellers' products to your own selling list
· Direct Communication
- Send direct messages to sellers or buyers with one click for easy communication
· Account Settings
- Change your Depop account email and password directly within the extension
· Search and Like
- Bulk search products and like them with one click to increase engagement
Why Choose DepopAid?
- Save Time: Automate repetitive tasks and focus on growing your business
- Increase Sales: Boost your store and product visibility to reach more potential buyers
- Easy to Use: No technical background needed, simple to get started
- Highly Customizable: Tailor settings according to your needs
Try DepopAid free for 7 days, no credit card required. Visit https://depopaid.com/ now to start your journey with the ultimate Depop seller assistant and make selling simpler and more efficient!
